Check heritrix_out.log. Hopefully it has more precise info on what went 
awry. The below doesn't tell us much (No line numbers from compiled 
JSP). Can you connect via JMX (Use jconsole or the cmdline_jmxclient)? 
If so, you could checkpoint your broad crawl and then restart and 
recover the application.

If you can figure a recipe to reproduce the below, send it on over (I 
just tried multiple crawling instances and seems to work fine).

St.Ack


goblin_cz wrote:
>
> Hallo,
> I ran broad crawl and because I want something try, I started new
> instance in page local-instances.jsp and on it little crawl.
> Everything looks ok but after few minutes I have get on
> local-instances.jsp this exception:
>
> HTTP ERROR: 500 Internal Server Error
>
> RequestURI=/local-instances.jsp
>
> and on index.jsp
>

> Source)
